node.text_zh:
民主派初選懶人包 初選網站（必看）

🗓 7.11（六）、7.12（日）9am - 9pm，留意部份票站開放時間不同。
🏛 你可於所屬2020立法會選舉選區任何一個票站帶同住址證明投票，不一定到自己區議會選區投票。
1️⃣ 所有選民均經網站投票，不用安裝應用程式。
2️⃣ 向工作人員展示身分證，以供驗證。
3️⃣ 向工作人員展示以下任何文件：
(a) 住址證明
(b) 過去的投票通知
(c) 詳情請瀏覽投票服務站地圖（截至7月6日）
node.text_en:
🗓 7.11 (Sat), 7.12 (Sun) 9am - 9pm, some stations have different opening hours.
🏛 You can vote at any station in your LegCo 2020 district (not necessarily in your own 2019 DC Election constituency)
1️⃣ Bring your own smartphone and address proof. All voters will cast their vote through official website, there's no need to install any mobile app.
2️⃣ Present your HKID card to the station staff for verification.
3️⃣ Provide any one of the following documents to the station staff:
(a) Address proof,
(b) Past election poll card
(c) For details please refer to the  official website, Google Map (Last updated on July 6)
